description: "Map of the northern Malacca Strait—between Sumatra and Malaya—with shoals and reefs marked, some labelled as ‘dangerous’. The web of lines is a rhumbline network, while the numbers indicate sea depth (bathymetry), both used to aid navigation."
title: "Carte Plate de la Partie Septentrionale du Détroit de Malac : depuis la Rade D'Áchem jusqu'a Malac"
